item.title: Perspectives on Africa -> Its all about the lens
item.description: When you look at this picture what do you see? I see a man who is satisfied with his situation. Sure there are the tribal markings, the blanket over the shoulder, the bleakness of the background and the stuff on the back of the manâ€™s neck.
